mapper.insert: INSERT INTO op_wordcloud (wordcloud_srl, searchword, searchdate, category_srl, subcategory_srl) VALUES (wordcloud_srl_seq.nextval, #{searchword}, #{searchdate}, #{category_srl}, #{subcategory_srl})
mapper.select: select searchword, category_srl, subcategory_srl, searchcount, ranking from ( select Wc.*, rownum ranking from (select count(*) as searchcount,searchword,category_srl,subcategory_srl from op_wordcloud where searchdate>sysdate-7 group by searchword,category_srl,subcategory_srl order by searchcount desc) Wc ) where ranking between 1 and 20
